# Build Your Sandwich

![Sandwich](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

## Walkthrough
* Steps 1
Choose the type of bread you want to use.

* Step 2
Grab the types of vegetables you would like to put in
* Step 3
Grab the types of cheese __if it applies__
* Step 4
Grab the types of meat __if it applies__

* Step 5
Heat up the sandwitch __if it applies__
